body: Oof

@Champion of Love    Hey dipshit, nobody cares. Keep that garbage in twitter, reddit and tumblr.  Even if your bullshit orthodoxy and doctrinal tenets weren't  complete shit, they'd still be irrelevant because  these are just DRAWINGS. You are layers of fail and the apotheosis of cringe.

I honestly don't blame the MC for taking up that offer. It was his last chance with the girl and earlier in the story  she lied to him when he confessed. She seemed fine getting railed by the older man but her childhood sweetheart just wasn't good enough ? fuck that. Well done MC. NTR MCs that finally sack up and do what must be done are always appreciated.

@LuziusLuz 2/2 The fact of the matter is, there will always be men who are toxic to others just because they couldn't imagine to be in another's shoes for the life of them. This is especially pronounced if the one in question is of other sex. This is strictly my opinion, but judging someone's morals is paradoxical in itself, simply because your tools for it are morals that can be just as wrong. Trying to correct them is kind of pointless anyways, as they will just screech at you for being an sjw, or otherwise scapegoat their way out. But as long as they don't pass all the unnecessary hate to their children, not much real harm is done. Thankfully we (mostly) live in a world in which women no longer need to put up with such bullshit, so naturally these kind of takes will be weeded out. Why else do you think we're spending so much time on a hentai site, even typing essays? You're fighting the good fight, but you're in the wrong place.

@LuziusLuz Yo my man... in case you didn't know, the whole 'Victim blaming' has been a thing for a very long time, and still exists in today's society, even if people aren't so vocal about it. Sjw's started so strong for a reason. Ever heard of the novel 'Lolita'? The alleged inspiration for the novel, is an actual crime that happened in 1948 in which the victim is also an underage child, much like this hentai. Just google 'Florence Sally Horner'. Oddly enough, the public's reaction to the crime is the same as this commen't section: claiming no actual abuse took place; the victim was in fact, compliant, despite being an elementary schooler. And as demented as my tastes are, I still have the self-awareness to see just how brain-damaged and ridiculous those kind of stances are. 1/2
My heart signs in joy reading these kinds of stories, too bad they usually don't have such clear-cut 'good' bad endings like this one. Truly marvelous.
Also needless to say but the bitch got used boo hoo get over it

Ah from what i can tell theres a mix of ppl just enjoying a doujin ppl with  a functioning brain dealing with a generation of retards offended n being sensitive fucktards am I wrong or did I hit the nail on it head

@Lurker774 Sorry for having some common sense, unlike some other here, like you. So believe it or not, but you dont need Twitter to see who the Victim is in this Story, just like i said, only common sense :)

Not bad but feels kinda short. Like I wanna see what the first time she being raped was, want to see more of the thought process and the reasoning behind Ri-kun also raping her. Without all this it feels empty and I can't relate/self insert into anyone here. The rape itself isn't even that good I feel like. Hmm maybe I'm just getting bored of these tags :/
I guess just call me a normie cus this don't work for me - maybe only bearded giga alpha chads get off to rape (and then shove dildo's in their butts)...
@lurker774 and @typical Japanese maincharacter, people can judge fictional media, and the victims are not at fault, if you disagree then touch grass
nah man this shit is too sad
I came to fap, not to rage

@Lurker774 for someone who does not give shit about morals you did write quite a book with your first statement, with "analyzing" every aspect of my and other posts, just goes to show what kind of a useless, double moralistic lowlife you and the rest, who victimblame a kid for being raped, are :) by the way, unlike a sickfuck like you i dont use Twitter, so take your mental illness and try to be somewhere else a smartass :)
Bitch mother sold her

@Lurker774 go and read some books about psychologie and traumas, educate yourself and then come back here and lets see if you are going to say the same you lowlife bastard

@Typical japanese MainCharacter wrong with the Age, im just someone who cant stand Victimblaming, i enjoy a good doujin no matter the Tags, but in Case of Victimblaming like some here do i cant be quiet, sorry for still being able to think straight. Also stop with your double Standards, your first sentence is you cant imagine how our lives are but then go on and elaborate what our lives most likely were like and how we are like we are? You know what that is called in the real World? Being a Hypocrite at its finest buddy :)
Jesus Fucking christ, i didn't see the NTR tag

I'm actually more interested in the comments than the art itself, if there was a tag for something like that, what should it be called?? Zetsubo?? As despair in Japanese is zetsubo,

 I [who believes that lust which is fueled by love gives the best feeling in the world] DECLARE IT UNFAPPABLE!

Folks such as "XV71" "shadowarrow" "Flixcer" "LuziusLuz" & "Z8567" have a hard time separating fiction from reality, I can't say what their lives is like and won't bother trying, what I will wager is them being sub age 15 (- 18 at best), about 70% of these types being women (or fags). A meshmash of emotionally volatile individuals who wear their mental illnesses as badges of honor online types because that's how the internet and social media has raised them to be. And they feel the need to express their triggered discontent with someone's work of fiction, one that they didn't pay for, mind you, as that... makes then feel validated in society? Can't figure these weirdos out, all I see from their unstable behavior is that these types make it a habit, a routine to drop by a comment section, get their bloody panties in a bunch then repeat in another work that from the cover, title & tags, know it'll upset them, over and over again like sad broken individuals they are.

All the overly sensitive/too mentally young to even be here in the first place: 1. Why did you click this? You saw the cover of this work, what the hell did you expect? 2. When you clicked this, if you read either the title or the tags, once again, what the hell did you expect? Seriously, what's wrong with you? You're upset that what's on the tin matches its inside? Why do you willingly, consciously keep exposing yourselves to hentai works that your feeble emotional minds can't handle? Are all of you mentally masochistic? 3. Where the hell do you think you are? You made an account on a hentai porn site, probably skipped looking at settings to realize there is a tag blacklist system which allows you to do just that and make it so you don't even need to see the thumbnail cover. But no, even if you know, that's now what you're here for, right? You go out of your way to land yourselves in the comment section of work that triggers your soy feelings so you can rant & bitch about it, right?
Poor little whore.
The true NTR are the friends we made along the way-
idk guys, were all probably gonna burn in hell anyways, this sin cannot be forgiven

yeah, i admit i got baited, the art isnt good enough to ignore the actual piece of trash that is the mc, but i respect the artist/author for putting it out and hoping people get aroused by it because people definitely will. wouldve been better (to me) if he just reported the man, took her in, and asked her out (to which she already wouldve said yes if she wasnt sold as a sex slave) but i mean my expectations were subverted and i got invested so i cant really complain. not favoriting but this probably deserves a 7/10 for the emotions i felt, positive and negative.
What an asshole I bet he only liked her because she looks cute and when given a chance he will fuck her like what he did lol fucking shitbag
this doesn't feel like a NTR... the asshole IS the MC... you can't be a hero and a villain, she's simply being abused.

@Everyone who blames the Girl...... Are you Guys fucking Idiots? Looking at her, she lives with only her Mother, she looks like a preteen, her Mother sold her off like livestock for Money, she got Raped and most likely traumatiized by it (and yes you fucking Idiots, raping a child can lead to it that the Child develops traumas and doesn```t trust anyone), and you Lowlifes still go on and blame the Victim that its her own fault? If anyone is to blame here, its the Mother, the Men who raped her and the "Childhoodfriend" and no one else, especially since the Girl even Calls out for help
She should have trusted her friend and told him before he witnessed shit that warped his heart. She had many chances, but kept her silence, and so her fate was sealed.

Hey, all! Translator here. If you like what you see, please do be sure to follow the artist on pixiv and consider purchasing their doujin through official retailers. He sells all his works for only 500 yen (about $5). This one was his darkest by far, but his other works are worth checking out too. Links provided in the credits page. My socials can be found there as well, and I post updates when I can. Next work is gonna be a commissioned release, so please look forward to it.
